segments.text: Well , Yuri , tell me about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry I can't bring better news , sir . The site is a disaster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's what I was afraid of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is not only the earthquake , sir . But the mudslides.Much of the north half of the site has been covered over by mud .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mud ? But Ivan told me there were no mudslides in that district . I thought all the mudslides were down in Chichitango .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's what we thought , sir . That's what the news reported.But there was one little mudslide in our district too . Right above our site .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's terrible ! What bad luck ! I wish we had never come to this country.But , if it isn't the strikes and the revolutionaries , it's the earthquakes.Our operations here are finished !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not your fault , Yuri.But tell me . When will Ivan be able to get out there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it took me about nine hours to get back here by car.If Ivan leaves tonight , I think he should be there by tomorrow lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good . I want an estimate of damages as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But sir ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Yuri ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn't recommend sending Ivan now.Especially not at night . The roads aren't safe .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has the earthquake damaged the bridges too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . The bridges are fine.But I've heard rumors that the revolutionaries are coming down from the mountains.There has been fighting , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you serious ? Fighting ? But I didn't hear anything on the news .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know the government controls the press here , sir . They don't want it reported .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , this is terrible , Yuri . Terrible ! So we can't even assess the damages . How can we do business in this country ? Either we're buried under mud , or we're in danger of getting kidnapped.No , I can't believe this mess !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't have to keep saying that , Yuri . It's not your fault.But me--I'm the one who should be sorry.It was me who suggested operations here in the first place ! Oh , what can we do ?
segments.speaker: S1
